comments:
Created 1.4.1905 out of the parishes of Oldcastle, Newcastle Lower, 
    Coity Lower and Daudy. See also Table 2, note (d).

Abolished 1.4.1905 and divided between the parishes of Bridgend, 
    Ewenny and Merthyr Mawr.

Created 1894 from the rural part of the parish of Newcastle Lower. 
    Abolished 1.4.1905 and divided between the parishes of Bridgend and Laleston.
Abolished 1.10.1895 and added to the parish of Llanfair.

Created 1.10.1895 ot of the parishes of St. Mary Church and Llandough. 
    See also Table 2, note (d).
Abolished 1.4.1905 and added to the parish of Bridgend.

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Coity Lower in Bridgend 
    Urban District. Abolished 1.4.1905 and added to the parish of Bridgend.
Abolished 1.10.1895 and added to the parish of Llanfair.
